trans-unit.source: See also Rob Pike: Lexical File Names in Plan 9 or Getting Dot-Dot Right
trans-unit.target: 另请参阅Rob Pike：计划9中的词法文件名或正确设置点对点

trans-unit.source: See also: #| to merge two sets and return a new one.
trans-unit.target: 参见： #| 合并两个集合并返回一个新集合。

trans-unit.source: See also: #concat to add elements from a set to self.
trans-unit.target: 另请参阅： #concat 将集合中的元素添加到 self 。

trans-unit.source: See below for instructions on hosting your compiler-generated docs on GitHub Pages.
trans-unit.target: 关于如何在GitHub Pages上托管编译器生成的文档,请看下面的说明。

trans-unit.source: See below for instructions on hosting your compiler-generated docs on GitHub/GitLab Pages.
trans-unit.target: 关于如何在GitHub/GitLab Pages上托管编译器生成的文档,请看下面的说明。

trans-unit.source: See the Travis CI section below to implement this in your build.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅下面的Travis CI部分,在你的构建中实现这个功能。

trans-unit.source: See the other definition of #on for examples.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参见 #on 的其他定义。

trans-unit.source: See the other definition of #on for examples. This method does not support subcommands.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参见 #on 的其他定义。此方法不支持子命令。

trans-unit.source: Seeks to a given offset (in bytes) according to the whence argument.
trans-unit.target: 根据whence参数寻找给定的偏移量（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Seeks to a given offset (in bytes) according to the whence argument. Returns self.
trans-unit.target: 根据whence参数寻找给定的偏移量（以字节为单位）。返回 self 。

trans-unit.source: Seeks to a location relative to the current location in the stream
trans-unit.target: 在流中寻找相对于当前位置的位置。

trans-unit.source: Seeks to a location relative to the end of the stream (you probably want a negative value for the amount)
trans-unit.target: 寻找到一个相对于流的末端的位置(你可能需要一个负值)。

trans-unit.source: Sends signal to the process identified by pid.
trans-unit.target: 向pid标识的进程发送信号。
发送状态和消息作为响应。

trans-unit.source: Sends a signal to the processes identified by the given pids.
trans-unit.target: 向给定的pid标识的进程发送信号。

trans-unit.source: Sends a message to a previously connected remote address.
trans-unit.target: 向先前连接的远程地址发送消息。

trans-unit.source: Sends a message to the specified remote address.
trans-unit.target: 向指定的远程地址发送消息。

trans-unit.source: Sends a value to the channel.

Sends a value to the channel. If the channel has spare capacity, then the method returns immediately. Otherwise, this method blocks the calling fiber until another fiber calls #receive on the channel.
trans-unit.target: 将值发送到通道。如果通道具有备用容量，则该方法将立即返回。否则，此方法将阻塞正在调用的光纤，直到另一个光纤在通道上调用 #receive 。

trans-unit.source: Serialize this Node as XML and return a String using default options.
trans-unit.target: 将此节点序列化为XML，并使用默认选项返回一个 String 。

trans-unit.source: Serialize this Node as XML to io using default options.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认选项将此节点序列化为XML到io。

trans-unit.source: Serializes an object to YAML, returning it as a String.
trans-unit.target: 将对象序列化为YAML，并将其作为 String 返回。

trans-unit.source: Serializes an object to YAML, writing it to io.
trans-unit.target: 将对象序列化为YAML，然后将其写入io。

trans-unit.source: Serializes to string representation as http url-encoded form.
trans-unit.target: 以http编码的形式序列化为字符串表示。

trans-unit.source: Serializing is achieved by invoking to_json, which returns a String, or to_json(io : IO), which will stream the JSON to an IO.
trans-unit.target: 序列化是通过调用 to_json 返回一个 String 或 to_json(io : IO) 来实现的，该to_json（io：IO）将JSON流传输到 IO 。

trans-unit.source: Server can send an unsolicited PONG frame which the client should not respond to.
trans-unit.target: 服务器可以发送一个不请自来的PONG帧,客户机不应该响应。

trans-unit.source: Set intersection: returns a new Array containing elements common to self and other, excluding any duplicates.
trans-unit.target: 设置交集：返回一个新的 Array ,其中包含 self 和other的公共元素，不包括任何重复项。

trans-unit.source: Set intersection: returns a new Array containing elements common to self and other, excluding any duplicates. The order is preserved from self.
trans-unit.target: 设置交集：返回一个新的 Array ,其中包含 self 和other的公共元素，不包括任何重复项。秩序是 self 。

trans-unit.source: Set the buffer size of both the read and write buffer Cannot be changed after any of the buffers have been allocated
trans-unit.target: 设置读和写缓冲区的大小 不能在任何缓冲区被分配后改变。

trans-unit.source: Set union: returns a new Array by joining self with other, excluding any duplicates, and preserving the order from self.
trans-unit.target: Set union：通过将 self 与other连接（不包括任何重复项）并保留 self 的顺序来返回新的 Array 。
将此节点的属性设置为value。

trans-unit.source: Sets attribute of this node to value. Raises XML::Error if this node does not support attributes.
trans-unit.target: 将此节点的属性设置为value。如果此节点不支持属性，则引发 XML::Error 。

trans-unit.source: Sets count consecutive values pointed by this pointer to the values returned by the block.
trans-unit.target: 将此计数器指向的计数连续值设置为该块返回的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets a handler for option arguments that didn't match any of the setup options.
trans-unit.target: 为不符合任何设置选项的选项参数设置一个处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Sets a handler for regular arguments that didn't match any of the setup options.
trans-unit.target: 为不符合任何设置选项的常规参数设置一个处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Sets a handler for when a option that expects an argument wasn't given any.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个处理程序,用于处理没有给定参数的选项。

trans-unit.source: Sets a handler which runs before each argument is parsed.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个处理程序,在每个参数被解析之前运行。

trans-unit.source: Sets a handler which runs before each argument is parsed. This callback is not passed flag arguments. For example, --foo=foo_arg --bar bar_arg would pass --foo=foo_arg and --bar to the callback only.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个处理程序，该处理程序在解析每个参数之前运行。此回调未传递标志参数。例如，-- --foo=foo_arg --bar bar_arg 只会将 --foo=foo_arg 和 --bar 传递给回调。

trans-unit.source: Sets a new cookie in the collection to the given HTTP::Cookie instance.
trans-unit.target: 将集合中的新cookie设置为给定的 HTTP::Cookie 实例。

trans-unit.source: Sets a new cookie in the collection to the given HTTP::Cookie instance. The name attribute must match the given key, else ArgumentError is raised.
trans-unit.target: 将集合中的新cookie设置为给定的 HTTP::Cookie 实例。name属性必须匹配给定的键，否则 ArgumentError 。

trans-unit.source: Sets a new cookie in the collection with a string value.
trans-unit.target: 在集合中设置一个新的带有字符串值的cookie。

trans-unit.source: Sets a new cookie in the collection with a string value. This creates a never expiring, insecure, not HTTP only cookie with no explicit domain restriction and the path /.
trans-unit.target: 使用字符串值在集合中设置一个新的cookie。这将创建一个永不过期，不安全，不是HTTP的cookie，没有明确的域限制，并且路径为 / 。

trans-unit.source: Sets all values for specified param name at once.
trans-unit.target: 一次设置指定参数名称的所有值。
设置指定参数名称的第一个值。

trans-unit.source: Sets should be a list of strings following the rules described at Char#in_set?.
trans-unit.target: 集合应该是遵循 Char#in_set? 中描述的规则的字符串列表。。

trans-unit.source: Sets should be a list of strings following the rules described at Char#in_set?. Returns a new String with all characters that match the given set removed.
trans-unit.target: 集合应该是遵循 Char#in_set? 中描述的规则的字符串列表。。返回一个新的 String ,其中删除了与给定集合匹配的所有字符。

trans-unit.source: Sets should be a list of strings following the rules described at Char#in_set?. Returns a new String with all runs of the same character replaced by one instance, if they match the given set.
trans-unit.target: 集合应该是遵循 Char#in_set? 中描述的规则的字符串列表。。如果匹配给定集合，则返回一个新 String ,其中所有相同字符的运行都被一个实例替换。

trans-unit.source: Sets should be a list of strings following the rules described at Char#in_set?. Returns the number of characters in this string that match the given set.
trans-unit.target: 集合应该是遵循 Char#in_set? 中描述的规则的字符串列表。。返回此字符串中与给定集合匹配的字符数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the position of the scan offset.
Sets the Node's content to a Text node containing string.
trans-unit.target: 将Node的内容设置为包含字符串的Text节点。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Node's content to a Text node containing string. The string gets XML escaped, not interpreted as markup.
trans-unit.target: 将Node的内容设置为包含字符串的Text节点。字符串会被XML转义,不会被解释为标记。

trans-unit.source: Sets the access and modification times of filename.
trans-unit.target: 设置filename的访问和修改时间。

trans-unit.source: Sets the bit at the given index.
Sets the bit at the given index. Negative indices can be used to start counting from the end of the array. Raises IndexError if trying to access a bit outside the array's range.
trans-unit.target: 将位设置为给定索引。负索引可用于从数组末尾开始计数。如果尝试访问数组范围之外的位，则引发 IndexError 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the current fiber logging context.
trans-unit.target: 设置当前光纤记录上下文。

trans-unit.source: Sets the current position (in bytes) in this IO.
trans-unit.target: 设置此 IO 中的当前位置（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the current position (in bytes) in this IO.
trans-unit.target: 设置此 IO 中的当前位置（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the current position (in bytes) of this IO.
trans-unit.target: 设置此 IO 的当前位置（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default paths for ca_certiifcates= and #ca_certificates_path=.
trans-unit.target: 设置 ca_certiifcates= 和 #ca_certificates_path= 的默认路径。

trans-unit.source: Sets the encoding of this IO.
trans-unit.target: 设置此 IO 的编码。

trans-unit.source: Sets the fragment component of the URI.
Sets the given OpenSSL::X509VerifyFlags in this context, additionally to the already set ones.
trans-unit.target: 在此上下文中设置已给定的 OpenSSL::X509VerifyFlags 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the given value at the given index.
trans-unit.target: 在给定索引处设置给定值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the given value at the given index.
trans-unit.target: 在给定的索引处设置给定值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the handler for this signal to the passed function.
trans-unit.target: 将该信号的处理程序设置为通过的函数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the host component of the URI.
Sets the maximum permitted combined size for the headers in an HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 设置HTTP请求中头信息的最大允许组合大小。

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum permitted size for the request line in an HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 设置HTTP请求中请求行的最大允许大小。

trans-unit.source: Sets the name for this Node.
Sets the number of seconds to wait when connecting, before raising an IO::Timeout.
trans-unit.target: 设置在提高 IO::Timeout 之前等待连接的秒数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of seconds to wait when connecting, before raising an IO::TimeoutError.
trans-unit.target: 设置在提高 IO::TimeoutError 之前等待连接的秒数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of seconds to wait when reading before raising an IO::Timeout.
trans-unit.target: 设置在提高 IO::Timeout 之前等待读取的秒数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of seconds to wait when reading before raising an IO::TimeoutError.
trans-unit.target: 设置在提高 IO::TimeoutError 之前等待读取的秒数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of seconds to wait when reading before raising an IO::Timeout.
trans-unit.target: 设置在提高 IO::Timeout 之前等待读取的秒数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of seconds to wait when reading before raising an IO::TimeoutError.
trans-unit.target: 设置在提高 IO::TimeoutError 之前等待读取的秒数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of seconds to wait when resolving a name with a Time::Span, before raising an IO::Timeout.
trans-unit.target: 设置在提高 IO::Timeout 之前使用 Time::Span 解析名称时要等待的秒数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of seconds to wait when resolving a name with a Time::Span, before raising an IO::TimeoutError.
trans-unit.target: 设置在引发 IO::TimeoutError 之前使用 Time::Span 解析名称时要等待的秒数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of seconds to wait when resolving a name, before raising an IO::Timeout.
trans-unit.target: 设置解析名称（在提高 IO::Timeout 之前）要等待的秒数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of seconds to wait when resolving a name, before raising an IO::TimeoutError.
trans-unit.target: 设置解析名称（在引发 IO::TimeoutError 之前）要等待的秒数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of seconds to wait when writing before raising an IO::Timeout.
trans-unit.target: 设置在写入之前等待提高 IO::Timeout 的秒数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of seconds to wait when writing before raising an IO::TimeoutError.
trans-unit.target: 设置在写入之前等待提高 IO::TimeoutError 的秒数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the open timeout with a Time::Span to wait when connecting, before raising an IO::Timeout.
trans-unit.target: 设置打开超时时间为 Time::Span 以在连接时等待，然后提高 IO::Timeout 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the open timeout with a Time::Span to wait when connecting, before raising an IO::TimeoutError.
trans-unit.target: 设置打开超时时间为 Time::Span 以在连接时等待，然后引发 IO::TimeoutError 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the password component of the URI.
Sets the path component of the URI.
Sets the path to a directory containing all CA certificates used to validate the peers certificate.
trans-unit.target: 设置包含所有用于验证对等体证书的CA证书的目录路径。

trans-unit.source: Sets the path to a directory containing all CA certificates used to validate the peers certificate. The certificates should be in PEM format and the c_rehash(1) utility must have been run in the directory.
trans-unit.target: 将路径设置为包含所有用于验证对等证书的CA证书的目录。证书应为PEM格式，并且 c_rehash(1) 实用程序必须已在目录中运行。

trans-unit.source: Sets the path to a file containing all CA certificates, in PEM format, used to validate the peers certificate.
trans-unit.target: 设置包含所有PEM格式的CA证书的文件路径,用于验证对等体证书。

trans-unit.source: Sets the port component of the URI.
trans-unit.target: 设置 URI 的端口组件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the query component of the URI.
Sets the quote char to use, either ' or ".
trans-unit.target: 将引号char设置为使用 ' 或 " 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the read timeout with a Time::Span, to wait when reading before raising an IO::Timeout.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Time::Span 设置读取超时，以在读取时等待，然后提高 IO::Timeout 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the read timeout with a Time::Span, to wait when reading before raising an IO::TimeoutError.
trans-unit.target: 将读取超时设置为 Time::Span ，以在读取时等待，然后引发 IO::TimeoutError 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the scheme component of the URI.
Sets the time to wait when reading before raising an IO::Timeout.
trans-unit.target: 设置读取前等待的时间，然后提高 IO::Timeout 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the time to wait when reading before raising an IO::TimeoutError.
trans-unit.target: 设置在读取之前等待的时间，然后引发 IO::TimeoutError 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the time to wait when writing before raising an IO::Timeout.
trans-unit.target: 设置在写入之前等待的时间，然后提高 IO::Timeout 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the time to wait when writing before raising an IO::TimeoutError.
trans-unit.target: 设置在写入之前等待引发 IO::TimeoutError 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the user component of the URI.
Sets the value for environment variable named key as value.
trans-unit.target: 将名为key的环境变量的值设置为value。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value for environment variable named key as value. Overwrites existing environment variable if already present. Returns value if successful, otherwise raises an exception. If value is nil, the environment variable is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 将名为key的环境变量的值设置为value。如果已经存在，则覆盖现有的环境变量。如果成功，则返回值，否则引发异常。如果value为 nil ，则删除环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of key to the given value.
Sets the value of libc's errno.
trans-unit.target: 设置 libc 的 errno 值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of parameter key to the given value.
trans-unit.target: 将参数key的值设置为给定值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value pointed at this pointer's address plus offset * sizeof(T).
trans-unit.target: 设置指向此指针地址的值加上 offset * sizeof(T) 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value pointed by this pointer.
Sets the verify mode. See the SSL_CTX_set_verify(3) manpage for more details.
trans-unit.target: 设置验证模式。有关更多详细信息，请参见 SSL_CTX_set_verify(3) 联机帮助页。

trans-unit.source: Sets the write timeout - if any chunk of request is not written within the number of seconds provided, IO::TimeoutError exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: 设置写入超时-如果在提供的秒数内未写入任何请求块，则会引发 IO::TimeoutError 异常。

trans-unit.source: Sets the write timeout - if any chunk of request is not written within the provided Time::Span, IO::TimeoutError exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: 将写超时-如果请求的任何一块没有提供书面内 Time::Span ， IO::TimeoutError 异常。

trans-unit.source: Sets this context verify param to the default one of the given name.
trans-unit.target: 将此上下文验证参数设置为给定名称的默认参数。

trans-unit.source: Sets up an HTTP::Client to add an OAuth authorization header to every request performed.
trans-unit.target: 设置 HTTP::Client 以向执行的每个请求添加OAuth授权标头。

trans-unit.source: Sets up an HTTP::Client to add an OAuth authorization header to every request performed. Check this module's docs for an example usage.
trans-unit.target: 设置 HTTP::Client 以向执行的每个请求添加OAuth授权标头。查看此模块的文档以获取示例用法。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether transmitted multicast packets should be copied and sent back to the originator, if the host has joined the multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 设置如果主机已经加入了组播组,是否应该将传输的组播数据包复制并发回给发起者。

trans-unit.source: Setups logging based on LOG_LEVEL environment variable.
trans-unit.target: 根据 LOG_LEVEL 环境变量设置日志记录。

trans-unit.source: Setups logging bindings discarding all previous configurations.
trans-unit.target: 设置日志绑定,放弃之前的所有配置。

trans-unit.source: Setups logging for sources using the specified level, backend.
trans-unit.target: 设置日志记录来源使用指定的级别，后端。

trans-unit.source: Setups logging for all sources using the specified level, backend.
trans-unit.target: 设置登录使用指定的所有来源的水平，后端。

trans-unit.source: Several Linux distribution are supported by WSL and the installation instructions for Crystal are equal to that of the respective Linux distribution, most commonly Debian/Ubuntu.
trans-unit.target: WSL支持几种Linux发行版，Crystal的安装说明与相应的Linux发行版（最常见的是Debian / Ubuntu）的安装说明相同。

trans-unit.source: Several ways of parsing CSV are provided. The most straight-forward, but slow or inefficient for some scenarios, is CSV#parse, which returns an array of arrays of all data.
trans-unit.target: 提供了几种解析CSV的方法。对于某些情况，最直接但最慢或效率最低的是 CSV#parse ，它返回所有数据的数组数组。

trans-unit.source: Shards is usually distributed with Crystal itself. Alternatively, a separate shards package may be available for your system.
trans-unit.target: 碎片通常与Crystal一起分发。或者，可以为您的系统使用单独的分 shards 程序包。

trans-unit.source: Short and long modifier style options (example: -h, --help)
trans-unit.target: 短和长修饰符样式选项（例如： -h ，-- --help ）

trans-unit.source: Shortcut for Iterator::Stop::INSTANCE, to signal that there are no more elements in an iterator.
trans-unit.target: Iterator::Stop::INSTANCE 快捷方式，表示迭代器中没有其他元素。

trans-unit.source: Shuffles count consecutive values pointed by this pointer.
trans-unit.target: 随机播放计数此指针指向的连续值。

trans-unit.source: Signals are dispatched to the event loop and later processed in a dedicated fiber. Some received signals may never be processed when the program terminates.
trans-unit.target: 信号被发送到事件循环,随后在专用光纤中进行处理。当程序终止时,一些接收到的信号可能永远不会被处理。

trans-unit.source: Signals the end of a JSON document.
Similar to break, next can also take a parameter which will then be returned by yield.
trans-unit.target: 与 break 相似， next 也可以采用一个参数，然后由 yield 返回。

trans-unit.source: Similar to #breakable except the decision to break or not is determined individually.
trans-unit.target: 与 #breakable 相似，但是否中断的决定是单独确定的。

trans-unit.source: Similar to Array#[], but returns NilLiteral on out of bounds.
trans-unit.target: 与 Array#[] 相似，但超出范围返回 NilLiteral 。

trans-unit.source: Similar to Array#first, but returns a NilLiteral if the array is empty.
trans-unit.target: 与 Array#first 相似，但是如果数组为空，则返回 NilLiteral 。

trans-unit.source: Similar to Array#last, but returns a NilLiteral if the array is empty.
trans-unit.target: 与 Array#last 相似，但是如果数组为空，则返回 NilLiteral 。

trans-unit.source: Similar to Enumerable#map for a Range. Only works on ranges of NumberLiterals considered as integers.
trans-unit.target: 类似于 Enumerable#map 的 Range 。仅适用于 NumberLiteral 的范围，该范围被视为整数。

trans-unit.source: Similar to Enumerable#to_a for a Range. Only works on ranges of NumberLiterals considered as integers.
trans-unit.target: 类似于 Enumerable#to_a 的 Range 。仅适用于 NumberLiteral 的范围，该范围被视为整数。

trans-unit.source: Similar to NamedTuple#[] but returns NilLiteral if key is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 与 NamedTuple#[] 相似，但是如果key未定义，则返回 NilLiteral 。

trans-unit.source: Similar to Regex#options, but returns an array of symbols such as [:i, :m, :x]
trans-unit.target: 与 Regex#options 类似，但是返回一个符号数组，例如 [:i, :m, :x]

trans-unit.source: Similar to IO::Memory, but optimized for building a single string.
trans-unit.target: 与 IO::Memory 相似，但已针对构建单个字符串进行了优化。

trans-unit.source: Similar to #to_s(io), but usually appends more information about this object. See #inspect.

trans-unit.target: 与 #merge 相似，但是修改了接收者。

trans-unit.source: Similar to #to_s(io), but usually appends more information about this object. See #inspect.

trans-unit.source: Similar to #read_alias but doesn't raise if an alias exists but an instance of type T isn't associated with the current anchor.
trans-unit.target: 与 #read_alias 相似，但是如果存在别名但类型T的实例不与当前锚关联，则不会引发。

trans-unit.source: Similar to #read_alias but doesn't raise if an alias exists but an instance of type T isn't associated with the current anchor.
trans-unit.target: 与 #read_alias 相似，但如果存在别名但类型T的实例未与当前锚关联，则不会引发。

trans-unit.source: Similar to an if, if a while's condition is a variable, the variable is guaranteed to not be nil inside the body. If the condition is an var.is_a?(Type) test, var is guaranteed to be of type Type inside the body. And if the condition is a var.responds_to?(:method), var is guaranteed to be of a type that responds to that method.
trans-unit.target: 与 if 相似，如果 while 的条件是变量，则保证该变量在体内不 nil 。如果条件是 var.is_a?(Type) 测试，则可以保证 var 在体内为 Type 类型。并且如果条件是 var.responds_to?(:method) ，则可以保证 var 是响应该方法的类型。

trans-unit.source: Similar to percent string literals, valid delimiters for %x are parentheses (), square brackets [], curly braces {}, angles <> and pipes ||. Except for the pipes, all delimiters can be nested; meaning a start delimiter inside the string escapes the next end delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 与百分比字符串文字相似， %x 的有效分隔符是括号 () ，方括号 [] ，大括号 {} ，尖括号 <> 和竖线 || 。。除管道外，所有分隔符都可以嵌套；表示字符串中的开始定界符转义下一个结束定界符。

trans-unit.source: Similar to regular code, Nop, NilLiteral and a false BoolLiteral are considered falsey, while everything else is considered truthy.
trans-unit.target: 与常规代码相似， Nop ， NilLiteral 和错误的 BoolLiteral 被认为是错误的，而其他所有内容都被认为是错误的。

trans-unit.source: Similar to the above cases, but creating an instance of an HTTP::Client.
trans-unit.target: 与上述情况类似，但是创建了 HTTP::Client 的实例。

trans-unit.source: Simply put, a Shard is a package of Crystal code, made to be shared-with and used-by other projects.
trans-unit.target: 简而言之,Shard是一个Crystal代码包,可以与其他项目共享和使用。

trans-unit.source: Simply, you can just add the following file to the root of the repo and name it .gitlab-ci.yml

trans-unit.source: Since typeof doesn't actually evaluate the expression, it can be used on methods at compile time, such as in this example, which recursively forms a union type out of nested type parameters:
trans-unit.target: 由于 typeof 实际上并不评估表达式，因此可以在编译时在方法上使用它，例如在本示例中，它可以从嵌套类型参数中递归形成联合类型：

trans-unit.source: Since UTC does not have any time zone transitions, each date-time is unambiguously resolved.
trans-unit.target: 由于UTC没有任何时区转换,所以每个日期时间都会被毫不含糊地解析。

trans-unit.source: Since databases are separate services from the application using them, the connections might go down, the services might be restarted, and other sort of things the program might not want to care about.
trans-unit.target: 由于数据库与使用数据库的应用程序是独立的服务,所以连接可能会中断,服务可能会被重新启动,以及其他类型的事情,程序可能不想关心。

trans-unit.source: Since the return type of TupleLiteral is iterable, we can rewrite the previous example in a better way. By extension, all of the methods on TupleLiteral are available for use as well.
trans-unit.target: 由于 TupleLiteral 的返回类型是可迭代的，因此我们可以以更好的方式重写前面的示例。推而广之，所有的方法上 TupleLiteral 可供使用为好。

trans-unit.source: Since the space after the end of the block may be in use, realloc may find it necessary to copy the block to a new address where more free space is available. The value of realloc is the new address of the block. If the block needs to be moved, realloc copies the old contents.
trans-unit.target: 由于块结束后的空间可能会被使用,realloc可能会发现有必要将块复制到一个有更多可用空间的新地址。realloc的值是块的新地址。如果需要移动块,realloc会复制旧的内容。

trans-unit.source: Since the system's settings may change during a program's runtime, the result may not be identical between different invocations.
trans-unit.target: 由于在程序运行过程中,系统的设置可能会发生变化,所以不同的调用之间的结果可能不完全相同。

trans-unit.source: Since this method returns a NamedTupleLiteral, all of the methods on that type are available for use. Especially #double_splat which makes it easy to pass annotation arguments to methods.
trans-unit.target: 由于此方法返回 NamedTupleLiteral ，因此该类型上的所有方法都可以使用。特别是 #double_splat ，它可以轻松地将注释参数传递给方法。

trans-unit.source: Size of the file, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 文件的大小,以字节为单位。

trans-unit.source: Skips elements up to, but not including, the first element for which the block returns nil or false and returns an Array containing the remaining elements.
trans-unit.target: 跳过元素，直到但不包括该块为其返回 nil 或 false 的第一个元素，并返回包含其余元素的 Array 。

trans-unit.source: Skips the rest of the file from which it is executed.
trans-unit.target: 跳过执行该文件的其余部分。

trans-unit.source: Skips the rest of the file from which it is executed. Typical usage is to skip files that have platform specific code, without having to surround the most relevant code in {% if flag?(...) %} ... {% end %} macro blocks.
trans-unit.target: 跳过从中执行文件的其余部分。典型的用法是跳过具有平台特定代码的文件，而不必在 {% if flag?(...) %} ... {% end %} 宏块中使用最相关的代码。

trans-unit.source: So let’s present an example with a rollback fired by an exception placed at the outer-transaction:
trans-unit.target: 因此，让我们给出一个示例，该示例具有在外部事务中放置的异常触发的回滚：

trans-unit.source: So now the question would be: do we need to implement an options parser? No need to, Crystal got us covered with the class OptionParser. Let’s build an application using this parser!
trans-unit.target: 所以现在的问题是：我们需要实现一个选项解析器吗？不需要，Crystal让我们覆盖了 OptionParser 类。让我们使用此解析器构建一个应用程序！

trans-unit.source: So, how does all this work? Well … magic! No, it’s not really magic! Just Crystal making our life easy. When our application starts, the block passed to OptionParser#parse gets executed. In that block we define all the options. After the block is executed, the parser will start consuming the arguments passed to the application, trying to match each one with the options defined by us. If an option matches then the block passed to parser#on gets executed!
trans-unit.target: 那么，这一切如何运作？好吧……魔术！不，这真的不是魔术！水晶使我们的生活变得轻松。当我们的应用程序启动时，传递给 OptionParser#parse 的块将执行。在该块中，我们定义所有选项。执行完该块后，解析器将开始使用传递给应用程序的参数，尝试将每个参数与我们定义的选项进行匹配。如果一个选项匹配，则传递给 parser#on 的块将被执行！

trans-unit.source: So, let's add this option handlers and merge all this CLI applications into one fabulous CLI application!
trans-unit.target: 所以,让我们添加这个选项处理程序,并将所有这些CLI应用程序合并成一个美妙的CLI应用程序

trans-unit.source: So, you should never do this:
trans-unit.target: 所以,你千万不要这样做。

trans-unit.source: Some compiler optimizations, like having to analyze a method just once, and incremental compilation, are nearly impossible to do.
trans-unit.target: 有些编译器的优化,比如一个方法只需要分析一次,增量编译,几乎是不可能做到的。

trans-unit.source: Some expressions won't return to the current scope and therefore have no return type. This is expressed as the special return type NoReturn.
trans-unit.target: 某些表达式不会返回当前范围，因此没有返回类型。这表示为特殊的返回类型 NoReturn 。

trans-unit.source: Some low-level primitives are provided. They are mostly useful for interfacing with C libraries and for low-level code.
trans-unit.target: 提供了一些低级的基元,它们主要用于与C库的接口和低级代码。它们主要用于与C库的接口和低级代码。

trans-unit.source: Some observations from the above example: the inner_tx works with the values updated although the outer_tx is pending the commit. The connection used by outer_tx and inner_tx is the same connection. This is because the inner_tx inherits the connection from the outer_tx when created.
trans-unit.target: 上面示例的一些观察结果：尽管 outer_tx 暂挂提交，但 inner_tx 可以使用更新的值。 outer_tx 和 inner_tx 使用的连接是相同的连接。这是因为 inner_tx 继承了连接 outer_tx 创建时。

trans-unit.source: Some syntax sugar that contains the = character is available:
trans-unit.target: 可以使用一些包含 = 字符的语法糖：

trans-unit.source: Some zones have a #name or abbreviation (such as PDT, CEST). For an unnamed zone the formatted offset should be used as name.
trans-unit.target: 一些区域具有 #name 或缩写（例如 PDT ， CEST ）。对于未命名区域，应使用格式化的偏移量作为名称。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the compiler can't infer the type of a block. This can happen in recursive calls that depend on each other. In those cases you can use as to let it know the type:
trans-unit.target: 有时，编译器无法推断出块的类型。这可能在相互依赖的递归调用中发生。在这种情况下，您可以使用 as 来告知其类型：

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you need to work directly with strings built from combining string literals with other values. You shouldn't just concatenate these strings with String#+(String) but rather use string interpolation which allows to embed expressions into a string literal: "Hello, #{name}" is better than "Hello, " + name.to_s.
trans-unit.target: 有时，您需要直接使用通过将字符串文字与其他值组合而构建的字符串。您不应该只将这些字符串与 String#+(String) 串联，而应使用允许将表达式嵌入到字符串文字中的字符串插值： "Hello, #{name}" 比 "Hello, " + name.to_s 。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, we may need the user to input a value. How do we read that value? Easy, peasy! Let’s create a new application: the Fab Four will sing with us any phrase we want. When running the application, it will request a phrase to the user and the magic will happen!
trans-unit.target: 有时，我们可能需要用户输入一个值。我们如何读取该值？十分简单！让我们创建一个新的应用程序：第四工厂将与我们一起唱我们想要的任何短语。当运行该应用程序时，它将向用户请求一个短语，魔术就会发生！

trans-unit.source: Spawns a Fiber to compute &block in the background after delay has elapsed.

trans-unit.source: Spawns a Fiber to compute &block in the background after delay has elapsed. Access to get is synchronized between fibers. &block is only called once. May be canceled before &block is called by calling cancel.
trans-unit.target: 延迟过去后，产生 Fiber 以在后台计算和阻止。光纤之间同步获取访问。＆block仅调用一次。可以在通过调用 cancel 调用＆block之前取消。

trans-unit.source: Spawns a Fiber to compute &block in the background.
trans-unit.target: 生成 Fiber 以在后台计算和阻止。

trans-unit.source: Spawns a Fiber to compute &block in the background. Access to get is synchronized between fibers. &block is only called once.
trans-unit.target: 生成 Fiber 以在后台计算和阻止。光纤之间同步获取访问。＆block仅调用一次。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an ALPN protocol to negotiate with the remote endpoint.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an ALPN protocol to negotiate with the remote endpoint. This is required to negotiate HTTP/2 with browsers, since browser vendors decided not to implement HTTP/2 over insecure connections.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the format to convert a Time to and from a String.

trans-unit.source: Specify a list of TLS ciphers to use or discard.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用或放弃的TLS密码列表。

trans-unit.source: Specify the path to the certificate chain file to use.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的证书链文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: Specify the path to the certificate chain file to use. In server mode this is presented to the client, in client mode this used as client certificate.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的证书链文件的路径。在服务器模式下,这个文件会被提交给客户端,在客户端模式下,这个文件会被用作客户端证书。

trans-unit.source: Specify the path to the private key to use.

trans-unit.source: Specify the path to the private key to use. The key must in PEM format. The key must correspond to the entity certificate set by #certificate_chain=.

trans-unit.source: Specs run in random order will display a seed value upon completion. This seed value can be used to rerun the specs in that same order by passing the seed value to --order.
trans-unit.target: 以随机顺序运行的规格将在完成时显示种子值。通过将种子值传递给 --order ，可以使用该种子值以相同的顺序重新运行规范。

trans-unit.source: Specs then use the should method to verify that the expected value is returned. See the example above for details.
trans-unit.target: 规格然后使用 should 方法来验证是否返回了期望值。有关详细信息，请参见上面的示例。

trans-unit.source: Specs, by default, run in the order defined, but can be run in a random order by passing --order random to crystal spec.
trans-unit.target: 规格默认情况下按定义的顺序运行，但可以通过将 --order random 传递给 crystal spec 来以随机顺序运行。

trans-unit.source: Splat operators can only be used for destructing tuples in method arguments. See Splats and Tuples for details.
trans-unit.target: Splat运算符只能用于破坏方法参数中的元组。有关详细信息，请参见Splats和元组。

trans-unit.source: Splits the string after any amount of ASCII whitespace characters and yields each non-whitespace part to a block.
trans-unit.target: 在任意数量的ASCII空格字符后分割字符串,并将每个非空格部分生成一个块。

trans-unit.source: Splits the string after each character separator and yields each part to a block.
trans-unit.target: 在每个字符分隔符之后分割字符串，并将每个部分生成一个块。

trans-unit.source: Splits the string after each newline and yields each line to a block.
trans-unit.target: 在每一个换行后分割字符串,并将每一行产生一个块。

trans-unit.source: Splits the string after each regex separator and yields each part to a block.
trans-unit.target: 在每个正则表达式分隔符之后分割字符串，并将每个部分生成一个块。

trans-unit.source: Splits the string after each string separator and yields each part to a block.
trans-unit.target: 在每个字符串分隔符之后分割字符串，并将每个部分生成一个块。

trans-unit.source: Stops the current parse and returns immediately, leaving the remaining flags unparsed.
trans-unit.target: 停止当前的解析并立即返回,剩余的标志未被解析。

trans-unit.source: Stops the current parse and returns immediately, leaving the remaining flags unparsed. This is treated identically to -- being inserted behind the current parsed flag.
trans-unit.target: 停止当前的分析并立即返回，剩下的标志未分析。这与 -- 插入到当前已解析标志的后面一样。

trans-unit.source: String interpolation is also possible with String#%.
trans-unit.target: String ＃％也可以进行字符串插值。

trans-unit.source: String might end up being conformed of bytes which are an invalid byte sequence according to UTF-8. This can happen if the string is created via one of the constructors that accept bytes, or when getting a string from String.build or IO::Memory. No exception will be raised, but invalid byte sequences, when asked as chars, will use the unicode replacement char (value 0xFFFD). For example:
trans-unit.target: 根据UTF-8，字符串可能最终由字节组成，这些字节是无效的字节序列。如果通过接受字节的构造函数之一创建字符串，或者从 String.build 或 IO::Memory 获取字符串，则可能发生这种情况。不会引发任何异常，但是当无效字符序列作为char询问时，将使用unicode替换char（值0xFFFD）。例如：

trans-unit.source: String might end up being conformed of bytes which are an invalid byte sequence according to UTF-8. This can happen if the string is created via one of the constructors that accept bytes, or when getting a string from String.build or IO::Memory. No exception will be raised, but invalid byte sequences, when asked as chars, will use the unicode replacement char (value 0xFFFD). For example:
trans-unit.target: 根据UTF-8，字符串可能最终由字节组成，这些字节是无效的字节序列。如果通过接受字节的构造函数之一创建字符串，或者从 String.build 或 IO::Memory 获取字符串，则可能发生这种情况。不会引发异常，但是当无效字符序列作为char询问时，将使用unicode替换char（值0xFFFD）。例如：

trans-unit.source: String operations (#gets, #gets_to_end, #read_char, #<<, #print, #puts#printf) will use this encoding.
trans-unit.target: 字符串操作（ #gets ， #gets_to_end ， #read_char ， #<< ， #print ， #puts #printf ）将使用此编码。

trans-unit.source: String operations (#gets, #gets_to_end, #read_char, #<<, #print, #puts#printf) will use this encoding.
trans-unit.target: 字符串操作（ #gets ， #gets_to_end ， #read_char ， #<< ， #print ， #puts #printf ）将使用此编码。

trans-unit.source: Strings in Crystal always contain UTF-8 encoded bytes. UTF-8 is a variable-length encoding: a character may be represented by several bytes, although characters in the ASCII range are always represented by a single byte. Because of this, indexing a string with String#[] is not an O(1) operation, as the bytes need to be decoded each time to find the character at the given position. There's an optimization that Crystal's String does here: if it knows all the characters in the string are ASCII, then String#[] can be implemented in O(1). However, this isn't generally true.
trans-unit.target: Crystal中的字符串始终包含UTF-8编码的字节。 UTF-8是一种变长编码：一个字符可以用几个字节表示，尽管ASCII范围内的字符总是用一个字节表示。因此，使用 String#[] 索引字符串不是 O(1) 操作，因为每次都需要对字节进行解码才能在给定位置找到字符。 Crystal的 String 在这里做了一个优化：如果它知道字符串中的所有字符都是ASCII，那么 String#[] 可以在 O(1) 中实现。但是，通常情况并非如此。

trans-unit.source: Structs and modules can be generic too. When a module is generic you include it like this:
trans-unit.target: 结构和模块也可以是通用的。当一个模块是通用的时候,你可以像这样包含它。

trans-unit.source: Structs inherit from Value so they are allocated on the stack and passed by value: when passed to methods, returned from methods or assigned to variables, a copy of the value is actually passed (while classes inherit from Reference, are allocated on the heap and passed by reference).
trans-unit.target: 结构体从Value继承，因此它们在堆栈上分配并按值传递：当传递给方法，从方法返回或分配给变量时，实际上传递值的副本（而从Reference继承的类则分配在堆上，通过引用传递）。

trans-unit.source: Structs inherit from Value so they are allocated on the stack and passed by value. For this reason you should prefer using structs for immutable data types and/or stateless wrappers of other types.
trans-unit.target: 结构从 Value 继承，因此它们被分配在堆栈上并按value传递。因此，您应该更喜欢将结构用于不可变数据类型和/或其他类型的无状态包装器。

trans-unit.source: Subclasses define this method to provide class-specific ordering.
trans-unit.target: 子类定义此方法,以提供特定类的排序。

trans-unit.source: Subclasses must implement this method to define the output pattern
trans-unit.target: 子类必须实现这个方法来定义输出模式。

trans-unit.source: Subclasses must not override this method. Instead, they must define #hash(hasher), though usually the macro def_hash can be used to generate this method.
trans-unit.target: 子类不得覆盖此方法。相反，他们必须定义 #hash(hasher) ，尽管通常可以使用宏 def_hash 生成此方法。

trans-unit.source: Subclasses must not override this method. Instead, they must define hash(hasher), though usually the macro def_hash can be used to generate this method.
trans-unit.target: 子类不得覆盖此方法。相反，他们必须定义 hash(hasher) ，尽管通常可以使用宏 def_hash 生成此方法。

trans-unit.source: Subclasses override this method to provide class-specific meaning.
trans-unit.target: 子类重载这个方法来提供类的特定含义。

trans-unit.source: Subcommands are any flag passed which does not start with a dash. They cannot take arguments. When a subcommand is parsed, all subcommands are removed from the OptionParser, simulating a "tree" of subcommands. All flags remain valid. For a longer example, see the examples at the top of the page.
trans-unit.target: 子命令是传递的任何不以破折号开头的标志。他们不能争论。解析子命令后，所有子命令都将从OptionParser中删除，从而模拟了子命令的“树”。所有标志均保持有效。有关更长的示例，请参见页面顶部的示例。

trans-unit.source: Subtracting two results from this method equals to the time elapsed between both readings:
trans-unit.target: 用这种方法减去两个结果,等于两个读数之间所经过的时间。

trans-unit.source: Supplement it with details and usages after that.
trans-unit.target: 之后再补充细节和用法。

trans-unit.source: Supported runners can be combined with Docker-based runners using a Build Matrix. This will allow us to run tests against latest and nightly and pinned releases.
trans-unit.target: 支持的运动员可以使用基于泊坞窗，结合运动员使用生成矩阵。这将使我们能够针对 latest ， nightly 和固定版本进行测试。

trans-unit.source: Supported compression methods in the current implementation.
trans-unit.target: 当前实施中支持的压缩方法。

trans-unit.source: Swaps the contents pointed at the offsets i and j.
trans-unit.target: 交换指向偏移i和j的内容。

trans-unit.source: Swaps the elements at index0 and index1 and returns self.
trans-unit.target: 交换index0和index1处的元素，并返回 self 。

trans-unit.source: Swaps the elements at index0 and index1 and returns self. Raises an IndexError if either index is out of bounds.
trans-unit.target: 交换index0和index1处的元素，并返回 self 。如果任一索引超出范围，则引发 IndexError 。

trans-unit.source: Swaps the items at the indices i and j.

Symbols are interpreted at compile time and cannot be created dynamically. The only way to create a Symbol is by using a symbol literal, denoted by a colon (:) followed by an identifier. The identifier may optionally be enclosed in double quotes (").
trans-unit.target: 符号在编译时进行解释，无法动态创建。创建符号的唯一方法是通过使用一个符号文字，用冒号表示（ : ），接着的标识符。标识符可以可选地用双引号（ " ）引起来。

trans-unit.source: Symlinks are dereferenced, so that only the permissions of the symlink destination are changed, never the permissions of the symlink itself.
trans-unit.target: 符号链接会被取消引用,因此只改变符号链接目标的权限,而不会改变符号链接本身的权限。

trans-unit.source: Symmetric Difference: returns a new set (self - other) | (other - self).
trans-unit.target: 对称差异：返回一个新集合 (self - other) | (other - self) 。

trans-unit.source: Symmetric Difference: returns a new set (self - other) | (other - self). Equivalently, returns (self | other) - (self & other).
trans-unit.target: 对称差异：返回一个新集合 (self - other) | (other - self) 。等效地，返回 (self | other) - (self & other) 。

trans-unit.source: TLS sockets need a context, potentially with keys (required for servers) and configuration.
trans-unit.target: TLS套接字需要一个上下文,可能有密钥(服务器需要)和配置。

trans-unit.source: TLS sockets will wrap the underlying TCP socket, and any further communication must happen through the OpenSSL::SSL::Socket only.
trans-unit.target: TLS套接字将包装基础的TCP套接字，并且任何进一步的通信都必须仅通过 OpenSSL::SSL::Socket 。

trans-unit.source: TODO Ensure correctness in local time-line.
trans-unit.target: 待办事项 确保当地时间线的正确性。

trans-unit.source: TODO eventually update to literals once UInt128 bit support is finished
trans-unit.target: 一旦完成对UInt128位的支持,TODO最终将更新为字形。

trans-unit.source: Tagging an example group (describe or context) extends to all of the contained examples.
trans-unit.target: 标记示例组（ describe 或 context ）可扩展到所有包含的示例。

trans-unit.source: Tags can be used to group specs, allowing to only run a subset of specs when providing a --tag argument to the spec runner (see Using the compiler).
trans-unit.target: 标记可用于对规格进行分组，在为规格运行器提供 --tag 参数时仅允许运行规格的子集（请参阅使用编译器）。

trans-unit.source: Takes optional quoting argument to define quote behavior.
trans-unit.target: 采用可选的引号参数定义引号行为。

trans-unit.source: Takes optional separator and quote_char arguments for defining non-standard csv cell separators and quote characters.
trans-unit.target: 采用可选的分隔符和quote_char参数，以定义非标准的CSV单元格分隔符和引号字符。

trans-unit.source: Tallys the collection. Returns a hash where the keys are the elements and the values are numbers of elements in the collection that correspond to the key.
trans-unit.target: 对集合进行统计。返回一个哈希值,其中键是元素,值是集合中与键对应的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Tells the compiler how to link a C library. This is explained in the lib section.
trans-unit.target: 告诉编译器如何链接C库。在lib部分中对此进行了说明。

trans-unit.source: Tells the compiler to never inline a method call. This has no effect if the method yields, since functions which yield are always inlined.
trans-unit.target: 告诉编译器永远不要内联一个方法调用。如果方法产生了结果,这没有任何影响,因为产生结果的函数总是内联的。

trans-unit.source: Tells the previously bound socket to listen for incoming connections.
trans-unit.target: 告诉之前绑定的套接字监听传入的连接。

trans-unit.source: Tells this class to decode JSON by using a field as a discriminator.
trans-unit.target: 告诉这个类通过使用一个字段作为判别符来解码JSON。

trans-unit.source: Tells this class to decode YAML by using a field as a discriminator.
trans-unit.target: 告诉这个类通过使用一个字段作为判别符来解码YAML。

trans-unit.source: Terminate the current process immediately. All open files, pipes and sockets are flushed and closed, all child processes are inherited by PID 1. This does not run any handlers registered with at_exit, use ::exit for that.
trans-unit.target: 立即终止当前过程。所有打开的文件，管道和套接字均被刷新并关闭，所有子进程均由PID 1继承。这不会运行在 at_exit 注册的任何处理程序，请使用 ::exit 。

trans-unit.source: Terminates execution immediately, printing message to STDERR and then calling exit(status).
trans-unit.target: 立即终止执行，将消息打印到 STDERR ，然后调用 exit(status) 。

trans-unit.source: Terminates execution immediately, returning the given status code to the invoking environment.
trans-unit.target: 立即终止执行,将给定的状态码返回到调用环境。

trans-unit.source: Test cases that have been defined or outlined but are not yet expected to work can be defined using pending instead of it. They will not be run but show up in the spec report as pending.
trans-unit.target: 已定义或概述但尚未预期到工作测试用例可以使用定义 pending ，而不是 it 。它们将不会运行，但会在规格报告中显示为待处理。

trans-unit.source: Test files are structured by use of the describe or context methods. Typically a top level describe defines the outer unit (such as a class) that is to be tested by the spec. Further describe calls can be nested within the outer unit to specify smaller units under test (such as individual methods). describe can also be used to set up a certain context - think empty Array versus Array with elements. The context method behaves just like the describe method and may be used instead, to emphasize context to the reader.
trans-unit.target: 测试文件是通过使用 describe 或 context 方法构造的。通常，顶层 describe 定义要由规范测试的 outer 单元（例如类）。进一步的 describe 调用可以嵌套在外部单元中，以指定要测试的较小单元（例如单个方法）。 describe 也可以用于设置特定的上下文-考虑空 Array 与带元素的 Array 。所述 context 方法的行为就像 describe 的方法和可以替代地使用，以强调上下文给读者。

trans-unit.source: Test your code. All of it. It's the only way for anyone, including you, to know if it works.
trans-unit.target: 测试你的代码。所有的代码 这是唯一的方法让任何人,包括你,知道它是否有效。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether str matches regex. If successful, it returns the position of the first match. If unsuccessful, it returns nil.
trans-unit.target: 测试str是否与regex相匹配。如果成功，它将返回第一个匹配项的位置。如果不成功，则返回 nil 。

trans-unit.source: Text blocks, for example to show program output, must be surrounded with triple backticks followed by the "text" keyword.
trans-unit.target: 文本块,例如要显示程序输出,必须在 "文本 "关键字后用三连号包围。

trans-unit.source: Text content can happen inside of an #element, #attribute value, #cdata, #dtd, etc.
trans-unit.target: 文本内容可能发生的内部 #element ， #attribute 值， #cdata ， #dtd 等。

trans-unit.source: Text content can happen inside of an #element, #attribute value, #cdata, #dtd, etc.
trans-unit.target: 文本内容可能发生的内部 #element ， #attribute 值， #cdata ， #dtd 等。

trans-unit.source: That is, T becomes the type that was effectively used to instantiate the method.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说， T 成为有效地实例化该方法的类型。

trans-unit.source: That is, a variable’s type is the type of the last expression(s) assigned to it.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，变量的类型是分配给它的最后一个表达式的类型。

trans-unit.source: That is, for every element that is an array or an iterator, extract its elements into the new array.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说,对于每一个是数组或迭代器的元素,将其元素提取到新的数组中。

trans-unit.source: That is, inside "lib/{project}" each project's directory exists (src, spec, README.md and so on)
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，在“ lib / {project}”中，每个项目的目录都存在（ src ， spec ， README.md 等）

trans-unit.source: That is, you can have different methods with the same name and different number of arguments and they will be considered as separate methods. This is called method overloading.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，您可以使用名称相同且参数数量不同的不同方法，并将它们视为单独的方法。这称为方法重载。

trans-unit.source: That logic also doesn't work with proc and method calls, including getters and properties, because nilable (or, more generally, union-typed) procs and methods aren't guaranteed to return the same more-specific type on two successive calls.
trans-unit.target: 这种逻辑也不适用于proc和方法的调用,包括getters和property,因为nilable(或者,更一般地说,union-typed)proc和方法并不能保证在两次连续的调用中返回相同的更特定的类型。

trans-unit.source: That means that any type that responds to [] with integers can be unpacked in a block argument.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着任何以整数响应 [] 的类型都可以在块参数中解包。

trans-unit.source: That means with normalized paths base.join(target.relative_to(base)) is equivalent to target.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着使用标准化路径 base.join(target.relative_to(base)) 等同于 target 。

trans-unit.source: That way, any Log.info call within the DB module will use the db source. And not the top-level ::Log.info.
trans-unit.target: 这样， DB 模块中的任何 Log.info 调用都将使用 db 源。而不是顶级 ::Log.info .info。

trans-unit.source: That will add the signing key and the repository configuration. If you prefer to do it manually execute:
trans-unit.target: 这将添加签名密钥和版本库配置。如果你喜欢手动操作,请执行

trans-unit.source: That will add the signing key and the repository configuration. If you prefer to do it manually, execute the following commands:
trans-unit.target: 这将添加签名密钥和版本库配置。如果你喜欢手动操作,执行以下命令。

trans-unit.source: That's it! With this config file, Travis CI by default will run crystal spec. Now, we just need to go to Travis CI dashboard to add the GitHub repository.
trans-unit.target: 而已！使用此配置文件，默认情况下，Travis CI将运行 crystal spec 。现在，我们只需要转到Travis CI仪表板即可添加GitHub存储库。

trans-unit.source: The crystal build command builds a binary executable. The output file has the same name as the source file minus the extension .cr.
trans-unit.target: 在 crystal build 命令生成一个二进制可执行文件。输出文件的名称与源文件的名称相同，但扩展名为 .cr 。

trans-unit.source: The crystal init command helps to initialize a Crystal project folder, setting up a basic project structure. crystal init app <name> is used for an application, crystal init lib <name> for a library.
trans-unit.target: 在 crystal init 命令有助于初始化水晶项目文件夹，建立一个基本的项目结构。 crystal init app <name> 用于应用程序， crystal init lib <name> 用于库。
